content: in this legal case a court in palermo has declared the open succession of a deceased individual and identified the assets that make up their estate the estate includes various properties and land located in palermo the court has determined the shares of the estate that each heir is entitled to receive additionally the court has dissolved the existing community property and assigned exclusive ownership of certain assets to one of the parties involved the court has ordered this party to pay adjustment amounts to the other parties based on their shares of the estate the court has also addressed preliminary issues raised by the parties such as the admissibility of certain claims and the simulation of a sale it has been determined that the estate is indivisible and therefore the court has ordered the division of the assets among the heirs the court has also addressed the payment of occupation indemnity and civil fruits enjoyed by one of the parties finally the court has concluded by addressing the costs of the litigation and determining that they should be offset among the parties this ruling was made on october 1 2019
